mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (bno, replytext, replyer, secretreply) values (#{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, #{secretreply})
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, replytext, replyer, r.regdate. r.updatedate, secretReply, m.userName, (SELECT writer FROM tbl_board WHERE bno = e.bno) AS writer FROM tbl_rely r LEFT JOIN tbl_member m on r.replyer = m.userId WHERE r.replyer = m.userId AND bno=#{bno} ORDER BY rno
SELECT rno, bno, replytext, replyer, regdate, updatedate, secretReply FROM tbl_reply WHERE rno = #{rno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno}
